name: Typokiller
description:
All you have to do is type. And type accurately, in order to make the enemies disappear.  

This game was created in 2 weeks for the Hej - one game a month Hungarian game-making challenge in february, 2022. The theme was: Minimalism

I have set up some other restrictions for my game too. these include:

Typing, entire game on one screen, military, serial killer
